org.apache.drill.metastore.rdbms.config

Interface RdbmsConfigConstants


  • public interface RdbmsConfigConstants
    Drill RDBMS Metastore configuration which is defined in MetastoreConfigConstants.MODULE_RESOURCE_FILE_NAME file.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String BASE
      Drill RDBMS Metastore configuration properties namespace.
      static String DATA_SOURCE_DRIVER
      RDBMS Metastore data source driver property.
      static String DATA_SOURCE_NAMESPACE
      RDBMS Metastore data source namespace.
      static String DATA_SOURCE_PASSWORD
      RDBMS Metastore data source url property.
      static String DATA_SOURCE_PROPERTIES
      RDBMS Metastore data source properties.
      static String DATA_SOURCE_URL
      RDBMS Metastore data source url property.
      static String DATA_SOURCE_USER_NAME
      RDBMS Metastore data source url property.
      static String DATABASE_NAMESPACE
      RDBMS Metastore database namespace.
      static String SQLITE_NAMESPACE
      RDBMS Metastore SQLite database namespace.
      static String SQLITE_PATH_CREATE
      Flag which indicates if RDBMS Metastore SQLite database path value should be created prior to data source initialization.
      static String SQLITE_PATH_NAMESPACE
      RDBMS Metastore SQLite database path namespace.
      static String SQLITE_PATH_VALUE
      RDBMS Metastore SQLite database path value.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SQLITE_PATH_CREATE

        static final String SQLITE_PATH_CREATE
        Flag which indicates if RDBMS Metastore SQLite database path value should be created prior to data source initialization. Flag can be set to false if path already exists.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
